title: Building Scene Layer Sublayer
description: A building scene layer is composed of an overview and the full model containing discipline and category layer. These layer types are represented as sublayers. A sublayer may contain other layers or sublayers (i.e `group`) to form a nested structure.

id.description: Identifier for this item. **IF** `layerType != 'group'`, resources will be at `/layers/{bim_layer_id}/sublayers/{this.id}/...`

name.description: Layer name. **Must be unique** per building scene layer

alias.description: Alias of the layer name. Can be empty if alias and name are identical.

discipline.description: Semantic for work discipline groups which refine the user experience.

modelName.description: A fixed string of sublayer information. Used by client applications to define specific behavior for the modelName. See [list of defined modelNames](subLayerModelName.md) for sublayers.

visibility.description: Visibility of the sublayer. Default is `true`
